auth

Class Sessions

  • java.lang.Object
    • auth.Sessions

  • public class Sessions
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Session generateSession(int userId)
      Generates a new sesssion with a random token associated with a user ID.
      static Session getSession(java.lang.String token)
      Returns a session by its ID token.
      static void invalidateSession(java.lang.String token)
      Invalidates (deletes) a session.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        public static Session getSession(java.lang.String token)
        Returns a session by its ID token. Returns null if the session doesn't exist or if it has timed out and has been removed.
        Parameters:
        token - the ID token for the session
        Returns:
        the Session object, or null if it doesn't exist or has timed out.

      • generateSession

        public static Session generateSession(int userId)
        Generates a new sesssion with a random token associated with a user ID. Last activity timestamp is set to now.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID for this session
        Returns:
        the Session object

      • invalidateSession

        public static void invalidateSession(java.lang.String token)
        Invalidates (deletes) a session.
        Parameters:
        token - the token for the session to invalidate
